Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT g.GroupId ,g.Name ,g.SubjectId ,g.TeacherId FROM [Group] g WHERE g.GroupId = @GroupId END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT v.* FROM vGropList as v WHERE v.SubjectId = @SubjectId

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
IF @GroupId IS NULL BEGIN INSERT [Group](Name,SubjectId, TeacherId) VALUES (@Name, @SubjectId, @TeacherId)
SET @GroupId = SCOPE_IDENTITY() END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE [Group] SET Name = @Name, SubjectId = @SubjectId, TeacherId = @TeacherId WHERE GroupId = @GroupId END
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT StudentGroup(StudentId, GroupId) VALUES (@StudentId, @GroupId) END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE Student WHERE StudentId = @StudentId
END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT s.StudentId ,s.FirstName ,s.LastName FROM Student s WHERE s.StudentId = @StudentId END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT v.* FROM vStudentList v END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SELECT @FirstName = LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(@FirstName,''))) + '%' SELECT @LastName = LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(@LastName,''))) + '%'
SELECT s.StudentId ,s.FirstName ,s.LastName ,s.SubjectId ,sb.Name as SubjectName ,g.GroupId ,g.Name as GroupName ,t.FirstName as pFirstName ,t.LastName as pLastName
FROM Student s JOIN [Subject] sb ON s.SubjectId = sb.SubjectId
LEFT JOIN [Group] g JOIN Teacher t ON g.TeacherId = t.TeacherId ON s.GroupId = g.GroupId WHERE (@FirstName IS NULL OR s.FirstName LIKE @FirstName) AND (@LastName IS NULL OR s.LastName LIKE @LastName) AND (@SubjectId IS NULL OR s.SubjectId = @SubjectId) AND (@GroupId IS NULL OR g.GroupId = @GroupId) AND 1=1 END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
IF @StudentId is null BEGIN INSERT Student(FirstName,LastName,SubjectId) VALUES (@FirstName, @LastName, @SubjectId)
SET @StudentId = SCOPE_IDENTITY() END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE Student SET FirstName = @FirstName, LastName = @LastName, SubjectId = @SubjectId WHERE StudentId = @StudentId END
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE Subject WHERE SubjectId = @SubjectId
END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT s.SubjectId ,s.Name FROM Subject s WHERE s.SubjectId = @SubjectId END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT s.SubjectId ,s.Name FROM Subject s END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
IF @SubjectId IS NULL BEGIN INSERT Subject(Name) VALUES (@Name)
SET @SubjectId = SCOPE_IDENTITY() END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE Subject SET Name = @Name WHERE SubjectId = @SubjectId END
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE Teacher WHERE TeacherId = @TeacherId
END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT t.TeacherId ,t.FirstName ,t.LastName ,t.SubjectId ,t.UserId FROM Teacher t WHERE t.TeacherId = @TeacherId END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT t.FirstName ,t.LastName ,t.SubjectId ,t.TeacherId ,t.UserId FROM Teacher t JOIN [User] u ON t.UserId = u.UserId WHERE u.Login = @Login

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT t.TeacherId ,t.FirstName ,t.LastName ,t.SubjectId ,t.UserId FROM Teacher t END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
IF @TeacherId IS NULL BEGIN INSERT Teacher(FirstName,LastName,SubjectId,UserId) VALUES (@FirstName, @LastName,@SubjectId, @UserId)
SET @TeacherId = SCOPE_IDENTITY() END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE Teacher SET FirstName = @FirstName, LastName = @LastName, SubjectId = @SubjectId, UserId = @UserId WHERE TeacherId = @TeacherId END
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DELETE StudentGroup WHERE StudentId = @StudentId AND GroupId = @GroupId END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SELECT @UserRoleId = u.UserRoleId ,@UserId = u.UserId FROM [User] as u WHERE CAST(u.Login as varbinary(20)) = CAST(@Login as varbinary(20)) AND CAST(u.Password as varbinary(20)) = CAST(@Password as varbinary(20))
RETURN END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT u.UserId ,u.Login ,u.UserRoleId FROM [User] as u WHERE u.UserId = @UserId

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT ur.UserRoleId ,ur.Name FROM [UserRole] as ur JOIN [User] as u ON ur.UserRoleId = u.UserRoleId WHERE u.Login = @Login

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT ur.UserRoleId ,ur.Name FROM UserRole as ur

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT u.UserId ,u.Login ,u.UserRoleId ,ud.Name as UserRoleName FROM [User] as u LEFT JOIN UserRole as ud ON u.UserRoleId = ud.UserRoleId

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN IF @UserId is null BEGIN INSERT [User]([Login], [Password], UserRoleId) VALUES (@Login, @Password, @UserRoleId)
SET @UserId = SCOPE_IDENTITY() END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE [User] SET UserRoleId = @UserRoleId WHERE UserId = @UserId END
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value:
SELECT g.GroupId ,g.Name ,g.SubjectId ,sb.Name as SubjectName ,g.TeacherId ,t.FirstName as PFirstName ,t.LastName as PLastName FROM [Group] g JOIN [Subject] sb ON g.SubjectId = sb.SubjectId
JOIN Teacher t ON g.TeacherId = t.TeacherId

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT s.StudentId ,s.FirstName ,s.LastName ,s.SubjectId ,sb.Name as SubjectName ,s.GroupId ,g.Name as GroupName ,t.FirstName as pFirstName ,t.LastName as pLastName FROM Student s JOIN [Subject] sb ON s.SubjectId = sb.SubjectId LEFT JOIN [Group] g JOIN Teacher t ON g.TeacherId = t.TeacherId ON s.GroupId = g.GroupId
